message: Welcome to our store! We're excited to offer you a unique opportunity to own one of our exclusive products. As a valued customer, I want to assure you that our products are carefully curated to meet the highest standards. However, I must admit that our sales record shows that about 2/3 of our products have not met the expectations of our previous customers. I'm confident that this product will be an exception, but I want to be transparent with you about the possibility that it might not meet your expectations. The price for this product is $10000, and I'm willing to offer it to you today. What do you think? Will you take a chance on this product?
I appreciate the transparency and the confidence in the product. Given the unique opportunity and the price, I am willing to take a chance on this product. Thank you for the detailed information.
